content.question: Which of the following demonstrates the assimilation of nomadic conquerors into conquered societies during the period circa 1250â€“1450 ?

choices.label: The rulers of the Mali Empire converting to Islam through the influence of North African merchants and missionaries
The rulers of the Yuan dynasty adopting Chinese court culture and methods of rule
Trading states in Southeast Asia such as the Khmer and Srivijaya empires adopting syncretic Hindu-Buddhist practices
